text: "The Best of Me" is a 2000 song by American singer Mýa and is the leading single from her second studio album Fear of Flying. It went to number 50 in the United States, number 64 in Switzerland, number 26 in Germany and number 75 in the Netherlands. It under-performed on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. ==Track listings== Notes * denotes remix producer ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Mýa songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: The Best of Me (Mya song)
